## Look up an Existing SecretBackendRole Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing SecretBackendRole resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.

The following state arguments are supported:




<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Backend</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The unique name of the Vault mount to configure.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Creation<wbr>Statements</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The database statements to execute when
creating a user.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Db<wbr>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The unique name of the database connection to use for
the role.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Default<wbr>Ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The default number of seconds for leases for this
role.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Max<wbr>Ttl</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">int</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The maximum number of seconds for leases for this
role.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Name</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A unique name to give the role.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Renew<wbr>Statements</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The database statements to execute when
renewing a user.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Revocation<wbr>Statements</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The database statements to execute when
revoking a user.
</dd>

    <dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span>Rollback<wbr>Statements</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">List&lt;string&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The database statements to execute when
rolling back creation due to an error.
</dd>

</dl>
